byline.contributor: Zia ur-Rehman reported from Karachi, and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan.
byline.original: By ZIA ur-REHMAN and SALMAN MASOOD

headline.main: 7 Police Officers Guarding Vaccination Team in Pakistan Are Shot Dead

snippet: There was no immediate claim of responsibility, and officials said they were investigating whether the attacks were connected to the immunization campaign.
lead_paragraph: There was no immediate claim of responsibility, and officials said they were investigating whether the attacks were connected to the immunization campaign.
